channel.description: #################################################### Unleashing WebAssembly in Kubernetes with Kwasm #################################################### Additional Info: - Kwasm: https://kwasm.sh - WASM vs Docker Containers vs Kubernetes vs Serverless: The Battle for Cloud Native Supremacy: https://youtu.be/uZ8xI26sno8 ######### Intro ######### Do NOT run the command that follows. It is only a preview. We’ll set it all up later. cat app.yaml ######### Setup ######### git clone https://github.com/vfarcic/kwasm-demo cd kwasm-demo Make sure that Docker is up-and-running. We’ll use it to create a KinD cluster.
